short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gorgeous beach wallpapers in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beach Tab extension brings fresh look to your default Chrome new tab page. With every new tab launch, you will enjoy gorgeous beach wallpapers.

Features:
- One fixed wallpaper: easily, in two clicks, you can change the boring new tab background to the magnificent views of the beaches
- Search form: faster access to the search bar
- Quick Links: handy location of the most popular social websites

Terms of Use: https://beachtab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://beachtab.com/privacy.html

By click on the «Add to Chrome» button in top right hand corner and installing Beach Tab extension, you are agreeing to install this extension, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy, and you are agreeing to our Terms of Use. The extension will change your New Tab services provided by Beach Tab.
